item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-the-selar-affilate-network-works/#comment-1024">Nwachukwu Juliet</a>.
Affiliate marketing means helping other people sell their products at an agreed commission. You don't need to be the owner of that product. You also do not need to download it first. Just promote ONLY the purchase link to that product. Once someone buys, you will get paid your commission.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nwachukwu Juliet.

Affiliate marketing means helping other people sell their products at an agreed commission. You don’t need to be the owner of that product. You also do not need to download it first. Just promote ONLY the purchase link to that product. Once someone buys, you will get paid your commission.
